titles.title: Veterans' Tax Fairness Act of 1993
A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide that veterans'allowances and benefits administered by the Secretary of Veterans Affairs are not included in gross income.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S6958-6961)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 6/8/1993--Introduced. Veterans' Tax Fairness Act of 1993 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exclude from gross income any veterans' allowance or benefit administered by the Secretary of Veterans Affairs.
